title: Dad and I
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: Fathers and children can do so many fun things together! The book Dad and I is full of photographs depicting a variety of delightful activities children can do with their dads. The text includes repetitive phrases, high-frequency words, and photographs, which all help support early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to classify information and connect to prior knowledge to better understand the text.
reviewWords: bake, bike, dad, garden, hug, play, swim, walk, write
comprehension: Classify Information                : Classify information in a text
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /d/ sound
grammar: Pronouns : Recognize and use the pronoun I
